What kind of boat will I get?

You'll have your choice of boat type when booking your ride. Whether you fancy a roaring speedboat or a quiet, classic sailboat, we can accomodate.


How many people can come along?

All of our boats accomodate two to six passengers, with some accepting more on a per-boat basis.


Where can I request a ride from?

 Anywhere a captain will accept it! Captains are expected to know and comply with all local boating and maritime laws and regulations and will offer their services however they can with respect to them.


Do I get a life vest?

 All captains carry at least enough life vests for the maximum number of passengers they are able to book.


How do I become a captain?

 Sign up today just like you would as a rider to begin offering your boat to seekers!


What happens if the weather is inhospitable?

 Unfortunately, we do not offer any refunds for rides requested through emBarco. Offerers also have to endure the unfortunate weather and will do their best to accomodate.




Question not answered here? Reach out to us at emBarcoApp@gmail.com!
